name: chicken amigurumi keychain
notes:
crochet this adorable chicken keychain with the diy fluffies youtube video.
this video is available for free in english and dutch.

when you make the chicken with cotton sport weight yarn the size will be: 5 cm/ 2 inch.
you can make the cute chicken amigurumi bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook.

english video:
https://youtu.be/f-g2oacdsss

dutch (nederlands) video:
https://youtu.be/chyweqs3moy

english written pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/free-chicken-crochet-pattern/

dutch written pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/nl/kip-haken-gratis-patroon
